testimonials.name: Michael R.
testimonials.text: Shawn did an incredible job on my BMW. It looks better than the day I bought it! The ceramic coating is worth every penny.

testimonials.name: Jennifer L.
testimonials.text: Best mobile detailing service in Suffolk County. Professional, punctual, and the results are always amazing.

testimonials.name: David K.
testimonials.text: My boat has never looked this good. Shawn's attention to detail is unmatched. Highly recommend!

testimonials.name: Sarah M.
testimonials.text: The express detail was perfect for my busy schedule. Quick, thorough, and my car looks brand new.

testimonials.name: Robert T.
testimonials.text: Outstanding service on my truck. The interior detailing removed stains I thought were permanent!

testimonials.name: Lisa W.
testimonials.text: Shawn is a true professional. The full detail exceeded my expectations. Will definitely be a repeat customer.

faq.question: Do I need to prepare my vehicle before the appointment?
faq.answer: No preparation needed! Just remove any valuable personal items. We handle everything else, including moving your vehicle if needed for optimal workspace.

faq.question: What's your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: We understand plans change. Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Same-day cancellations may incur a fee.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept cash, all major credit cards, Venmo, Zelle, and Apple Pay for your convenience.

faq.question: How long does ceramic coating last?
faq.answer: Our ceramic coatings provide 2-5 years of protection depending on the package selected and maintenance. We offer warranty coverage and maintenance plans.

faq.question: Do you charge travel fees?
faq.answer: Service within our core Suffolk and Nassau County areas is included. Extended travel outside these areas may incur a small travel fee, which we'll discuss during booking.

faq.question: What if it rains on my appointment day?
faq.answer: We monitor weather closely and will contact you to reschedule if conditions aren't suitable. For services requiring covered areas, we can work in your garage.

faq.question: Can you detail my vehicle at my workplace?
faq.answer: We bring our mobile service to your home, office, or any location in Suffolk and Nassau County.

faq.question: How often should I get my vehicle detailed?
faq.answer: We recommend a full detail every 3-6 months, with express details or washes monthly to maintain that showroom shine and protect your investment.
